actions.text: Amendment SA 4901 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 4901 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Lieberman. (consideration: CR S9092; text: CR S9092) To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Defense-Wide, up to $1,500,000 for the development of a field-deployable hydrogen fueling station.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4901 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Lieberman.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4901 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

purpose: To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Defense-Wide, up to $1,500,000 for the development of a field-deployable hydrogen fueling station.
